ygData.subject: Re: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: I see how it is!  It s great if OTHER classes are nerfed.  Ahh, thanks for the clarification! But nerf the most powerful class in Norrath on any server and
ygData.messageBody:
I see how it is! It's great if OTHER classes are nerfed. Ahh, thanks for the clarification!

But nerf the most powerful class in Norrath on any server and heaven help us!! You just lost all sympathy from me.

Caelrie, enchanter on Fennin Ro

considering our class relies on a spell like charm and necros didnt, i dont consider us "lucky" it wasnt taken away, i consider it good that necros had it taken away. it was a useless spell for them anyways.

At 09:30 AM 11/18/99 -1000, you wrote:
>>>>

The necromancers had the charm spell completely taken away from them. Be glad that didn't happen to enchanters.

Caelrie, enchanter on Fennin Ro


<<<<

tim borrelli
lead character animator
